photos.title: Community Excellence Trophy
photos.description: Recognition ceremony for top student volunteers.
photos.content: Students were honored for service activities and mentoring support in the neighborhood.

photos.title: Best Neighborhood Award
photos.content: The committee was awarded for cleanliness, safety measures, and resident engagement.

photos.title: Youth Science Medal
photos.description: School students honored at annual science showcase.
photos.content: Young participants presented practical projects around water conservation and waste recycling.

photos.title: Annual Cultural Evening
photos.description: Stage performances by residents of all age groups.
photos.content: Dance, music, and skits were performed during the yearly cultural celebration.

photos.title: Health Camp Registration Desk
photos.content: Doctors and volunteers conducted blood pressure and diabetes screenings.

photos.title: Weekend Tree Plantation
photos.description: Residents planting saplings in open community spaces.
photos.content: More than 80 saplings were planted with long-term maintenance commitments.

photos.title: Diwali Lights Walk
photos.description: Colorful decorations and rangoli around the community park.
photos.content: Families gathered for an evening walk and festive lighting across all blocks.

photos.title: Holi Celebration Ground
photos.description: Residents celebrating with music and colors.
photos.content: The Holi event included safe color zones, snacks, and children activities.

photos.title: Ganesh Chaturthi Pandal
photos.content: Community members collaborated on decoration and evening prayer arrangements.

photos.title: Inter-Block Cricket Match
photos.description: Friendly match between Block A and Block C teams.
photos.content: A close final over match with strong participation from youth and senior residents.

photos.title: Morning Yoga Session
photos.description: Open-air yoga activity in the central lawn.
photos.content: Residents joined guided breathing and mobility sessions for general fitness.

photos.title: Kids Football League
photos.description: Children participating in neighborhood football rounds.
photos.content: Parents and coaches supported kids through training, warmups, and match play.

photos.title: New Year Stage Program
photos.content: Residents welcomed the new year with performances and community announcements.

photos.title: Merit Certificate Distribution
photos.content: Certificates were awarded for academics, sports participation, and social service.

photos.title: Community Food Festival
photos.description: Food stalls and regional dishes hosted by residents.
photos.content: Families set up stalls featuring home-cooked dishes and seasonal specialties.
